info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 12:50AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF BROOME...SUSQUEHANNA... AND NORTHERN WAYNE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1249 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was over Kirkwood, or near Binghamton moving southeast at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Binghamton, Johnson City, Kirkwood, Conklin, Jackson, Susquehanna, Susquehanna Depot, Port Dickinson, Hallstead and Windsor. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 6. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 70 North and 80. Interstate 88 between 1 and 4. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 223 and 230. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
